title: Emote hotkey help PLEASE!
body:
I purchased the emote starter kit and cannot for the life of me figure out how to use them.

In game I have gone to options->hotkeys->comunications and the only emote reference in this entire list is the 'Mastery Emote'.

How do I pull up the emote wheel?

Someone please help... this is ridiculous.

replies.body: Thank you all, saved me from insanity!
and where can you change to hotkey for your emotes? Because Icant find it and I went through the options twice.
The default key for the Emote wheel should be T!

The default option is to Hold T and the emote wheel should show up.
[Default Settings, I Think](https://i.imgur.com/6RhRzBn.png)

But while on the default Window, you are able to set them up as to which emote goes where. Go to collection, Emotes. Set-up the page like a Rune page, save and it's good to go :)
[Setting Up Emotes](https://i.imgur.com/7WL4Os9.png)

Not sure how to post links correctly, so sorry if I messed up with them.

Edit: But I do remember it not working for an odd reason. So I re-assigned it to a new Hot Key, then back to the old one and ta-da, fixed. Thought I'd mention that, just in case.
